person.persName: Richard Carpenter Jr. (Fleming County, Kentucky, laborer)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Richard Carpenter, Sr. and Druscilla Carpenter. Resident of Fleming County in 1850. Laborer in Fleming County in 1860. Farmer in Fleming County in 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 341. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 2, p. 28.
